attributes.action: Demand traffic calming around Stockton-on-Tees schools after the death a 9 year old
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A child was knocked down and killed outside a school in Stockton. If they had been traffic calming measures in place, this incident may have been avoided.

We are trying to get the local councils to implement Traffic Calming measures around all schools, with a statutory 20 mph within 100 meters before & after all schools.
